root.name: Highlander: The Last of the MacLeods
root.description: StoryYou play as Quentin MacLeod, a young immortal, whose mother has been murdered and fellow villagers kidnapped. Quentin then embarks on a quest to defeat the one responsible for this, Kortan.ControversyIt is believed that somewhere, midway into level 2, there is a subliminal message of a half-naked Scottish woman, although this has never been confirmed.
